Before this recent sound inflation, I would keep the commercials on as background noise and might have absorbed a message point or two about the products being peddled, but not anymore: I began passing the time during commercial breaks in blissful silence, completely unreceptive to the messaging that subsidized the content. This is a recent issue. Something changed over the past few weeks and the auditory assault forced me into mute mode.
